original_text: For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you, that the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread:
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 전한 것은 주께 받은 것이니 곧 주 예수께서 잡히시던 밤에 떡을 가지사

sentences.original_text: For I have received of the Lord
that which also I delivered unto you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 전달한 것과 같은 것입니다

sentences.original_text: the same night in which he was betrayed
